About the Company: Trio Mercantile & Trading Ltd was incorporated on 26th August 2002 with the name Trio Mercantile & Trading Limited. The main object of the Company is to carry out and undertake business as financiers, and to carry out leasing and hire purchase and to carry on and undertake business of finance operation of all kind and every kind and to subsidize, finance or assist in subsidizing or financing the articles or commodities of all and every kind of description. The Company carries on the business of trading and investment. Company also carries out business of Agro Products & agency Business. They are located in Mumbai, Maharashtra.
